'''Snow Fox''' is a type of fox that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Raw Meat|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found north of [[Snow-Covered Path]] and in [[Entombed City - Ancient Palace]].
